pages.text: Ni:Sanka mari madada karanara allaha ta'ala ja che, jene a kitabanum avatarana karyum ane te sadacari lokoni madada kare che
ane tame je lokoni pana allahane chodine bandagi karo cho, te'o tamari kami pana madada nathi kari sakata ane na to te potani madada kari sake che
ane temane ko'i vatano adesa apava mate bolavo to, tene na sambhale, ane te'one tame ju'o cho jane ke te'o tamane jo'i rahya che jo ke te'o kami pana nathi jota
tame daragujara karo, satkaryani siksa apo, ane ajana lokothi alaga raho
ane jo tamane ko'i kharaba vicara setana taraphathi avava lage to, allahanum sarana mangi lo, ni:Sanka te khuba ja sambhalanara, jananara che
ni:Sanka je loko allahathi dare che, jyare te'o para ko'i musibata setana taraphathi avi pahonce che to te'o yada karava lage che, to acanaka te'oni ankho khuli jaya che
ane je loko setanoni vata mane che, te te'one pathabhrastatamam khenci jaya che, basa! Te'o chodata nathi

ane jyare tame ko'i camatkara jahera nathi karata to, te loko kahe che ke tame a camatkara kema na lavya? Tame kahi do ke hum tenum anusarana karum chum je mane mara palanahara taraphathi adesa apavamam avyo, a ghana purava che amara palanahara taraphathi, ane satya margadarsana ane daya che te loko mate je'o imana lavya che
ane jyare kura'ana padhavamam ave to tene dhyanathi sambhalo ane cupa raho, sakya che ke tamara para krpa thaya
ane he vyakti! Potana palanaharane potana manamam yada karya kara, ajiji sathe ane darata darata, ane unca avaja karata dhima avaje savara-sanja (yada karo) ane bhuli janara'o manthi na tha'i ja'o
Ni:Sanka je loko tara palanaharani najika che, te teni bandagi sathe ghamanda nathi karata, ane teni pavitrata bayana kare che ane tene sijado kare che
